definition: oral command/a word of command (used in drilling troops or gymnasts)/password (used by sentry)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: The pages to perform the maintenance should be password protected.
sentences.chinese: 執行維護的頁面應該有口令保護。

sentences.english: An authorization error occurred, please try retyping your password.
sentences.chinese: 發生了一個授權錯誤，請嘗試重新輸入口令。

sentences.english: This is an effective way to protect password security.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種有效的保護口令安全性的方法。

sentences.english: Rather, you enter the passphrase that you set in the first step.
sentences.chinese: 不過您可以輸入您在第一步中設置的口令。

sentences.english: Check the box, Apply Changes, put in your password, and click close.
sentences.chinese: 打上勾，應用改變，輸入你的口令，最後點擊關閉。

sentences.english: The commands Attention and Halt are only one word.
sentences.chinese: 立正和稍息的口令只有一個字。

sentences.english: This is usually through a user name and password dialog prompt.
sentences.chinese: 這通常是通過用戶名和口令對話框提示實現的。

sentences.english: Passwords are also very important when authenticating users.
sentences.chinese: 在驗證用戶時口令也很重要。

sentences.english: It is therefore important to not trivialize your passwords.
sentences.chinese: 因此不要使用簡單的口令很重要。

sentences.english: You may try the tongue twister.
Can you read the following tongue twisters fluently?
sentences.chinese: 你能流利地朗讀下面的繞口令嗎？

sentences.english: User authentication validates that the user name and password are correct.
sentences.chinese: 用戶身份驗證確認用戶名和口令是否正確。

sentences.english: Amid the rainstorm, Charles shouted orders to his fellow slaves.
sentences.chinese: 在大雨裏查爾斯對他的奴隸夥伴們喊着口令。

sentences.english: The door requires a password, and can be bolted from the inside.
sentences.chinese: 進入級長浴室需要口令，門也可以從裏面被鎖住。

sentences.english: He makes fun of me. but I'm a big fan of your aqua velva commercials.
sentences.chinese: 他在開我玩笑，不過我更欣賞你的繞口令表演。

sentences.english: Choose the No. from 10 tongue twisters in turn.
sentences.chinese: 小組輪流每次從10句繞口令中選取一個句子號碼。

definition: number off! (command in military drill)/count off!
flag signals (for communicating between ships or army units)/semaphore
to dress (troops)/to line up (to arrange in a straight line)
speech sounds/pronunciation/colloquial (rather than literary) pronunciation of a Chinese character/phonetic/audio/voice/(Internet) to voice chat/voice message
